com.amitinside.featureflags.annotation

Annotation Type Feature


  • @Retention(value=SOURCE)
 @Target(value=FIELD)
public @interface Feature
    This annotation is primarily used to annotate field that contains the feature identifier to be used in the source code. This is introduced to ease the effort to clean up obsolete features. The packaged annotation processor would be used to show warning messages if any such feature is expired.
    See Also:
    ExpirationType

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      String expirationDate
      The expiration date of this feature.
      String expirationDatePattern
      The expiration date input pattern of this feature.
      String expirationMessage
      The expiration message this feature.
      ExpirationType expirationType
      The expiration type of this feature.

    • Element Detail

      • expirationType

        public abstract ExpirationType expirationType
        The expiration type of this feature.

        If not specified, the expiration type of this feature will be considered as a feature that can never be expired

        See Also:
        ExpirationType
        Default:
        com.amitinside.featureflags.annotation.ExpirationType.NEVER

      • expirationDate

        public abstract String expirationDate
        The expiration date of this feature.

        If not specified, the expiration date of this Component will be considered as empty string

        Default:
        ""

      • expirationDatePattern

        public abstract String expirationDatePattern
        The expiration date input pattern of this feature.

        If not specified, the input pattern of this feature's expiration date will be considered as a feature that can never be expired yyyy MM dd

        Default:
        "yyyy MM dd"

      • expirationMessage

        public abstract String expirationMessage
        The expiration message this feature. This will be shown by the annotation processor if the annotated feature is expired.

        If not specified, the expiration message of this feature will be Feature is expired

        Default:
        "Feature is expired"
